verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>. In the YY <WH3068> put I my trust <WH2620> <WH8804>: how say <WH559> <WH8799> ye to my soul <WH5315>, Flee <WH5110> <WH8798> as a bird <WH6833> to your mountain <WH2022> ?

For, lo, the wicked <WH7563> bend <WH1869> <WH8799> their bow <WH7198>, they make ready <WH3559> <WH8790> their arrow <WH2671> upon the string <WH3499>, that they may privily <WH652> <WH8676> <WH1119> shoot <WH3384> <WH8800> at the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
If the foundations <WH8356> be destroyed <WH2040> <WH8735>, what can the righteous <WH6662> do <WH6466> <WH8804> ?

The YY <WH3068> is in his holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>, the YY'S <WH3068> throne <WH3678> is in heaven <WH8064>: his eyes <WH5869> behold <WH2372> <WH8799>, his eyelids <WH6079> try <WH974> <WH8799>, the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
The YY <WH3068> trieth <WH974> <WH8799> the righteous <WH6662>: but the wicked <WH7563> and him that loveth <WH157> <WH8802> violence <WH2555> his soul <WH5315> hateth <WH8130> <WH8804>.

Upon the wicked <WH7563> he shall rain <WH4305> <WH8686> snares <WH6341>, fire <WH784> and brimstone <WH1614>, and an horrible <WH2152> tempest <WH7307>: this shall be the portion <WH4521> of their cup <WH3563>.
For the righteous <WH6662> YY <WH3068> loveth <WH157> <WH8804> righteousness <WH6666>; his countenance <WH6440> doth behold <WH2372> <WH8799> the upright <WH3477>.
